column3: Why can't the wildcard `/*.cpp` be used as in other build files?

Based on a quick inspection it seems like the bench_bitcoin.vcxproj file could be auto generated from the makefile. There may have been a reason why @ken2812221 excluded it when he wrote the original python script. I'll put in on my list to look into.
@sipsorcery Does that mean you want to close this and follow up once you've had time to look, or is this still worth merging now/as-is?
Will resubmit the msvc-autogen fix on a different PR.
